body.name: Gaming USB Microphone for PC with ARM, BBEIYY Mic for Gamer 192kHz/24Bit Noise Cancellation Condenser microphone with Gain, Mute, Monitoring, Boom Arm for Streaming RGB Computer Mic for PS4/5 PC & MAC
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 6 hrs 16 mins
features: Gradient RGB Symphony Lights: Cyclic and gradient RGB lights, in line with your live broadcast aesthetics. Bring you an immersive gaming experience and awaken all your senses. There's also a palpable sense of security, and when the BBEIYY Microphone is muted, the RGB lights go off to let you know you're working. Prevent accidents when you forget to mute your PC Microphone for gaming.

Practical and convenient function: It is equipped with a one-button mute touch sensor. When you want to close the Microphone, you only need to touch it lightly to mute the sound, and the RGB light will go out to inform you that the Microphone has been successfully closed. Equipped with a rotary control volume button at the bottom. There is a 3.5MM headphone jack in the middle, you can plug in the headphones to monitor your own voice in real-time and make adjustments in time when recording.

Cardioid Polar Pattern: This Microphone features a cardioid polar pattern that captures crisp, smooth, and clear sound in front of the Microphone, reducing side pickup so it can focus on your voice. At the same time, it is equipped with a 25mm ultra-large capacitor diaphragm capsule, which can capture a wider range of audio with a sampling rate of up to 192kHz, and the pickup is delicate and noise-free.

SOLID FIT: With a weighted carbon steel base, your big movements won't knock the Microphone down, even during intense gaming sessions. The detachable metal anti-splash screen is adopted. Compared with the sponge, the metal anti-splash screen can filter the plosive sound more effectively. And the rubber elastic band is firmly clamped on the shock mount, which can reduce the vibration noise caused by violent keyboard tapping and mouse clicking.

Plug and Play: PC gaming Microphone for streaming, compatible with PS4/PS4pro/PS5 desktop and laptop. You can quickly enter the game chat. The 250CM long detachable USB data cable can be extended from the back of the computer host to the main body of your gaming USB Microphone without limitation.

Flexible Arm Boom: The easy-to-position metal boom adjusts to support a variety of setups, and you can quickly pull the podcast Microphone to your mouth when in use, or fold it away to save more space.

productInformation.value: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 148 ratings 4.5 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 RGB Lights 2 Mic Gain Knob 3 Plug & Play 4 One Touch Mute

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works and looks great!
reviews.reviewText: This microphone is amazing! The sound is perfect and it looks really cool. It has a volume control right on top of the mic and just a tap to mute/unmute. Very easy setup…I highly recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My mic came with superb quality packaging, ensuring it would not arrive damaged. Once unwrapped and used I found it easy to set up, plug-and-play was quick and quality is better than my last gaming mic.A way to control the lights or toggle them off (without actually muting the mic) would be nice; the lights were a bit bright up close. But I was able to deal with that with a pop filter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Its a really good product
reviews.reviewText: The gaming microphone exceeded my expectations with its crystal-clear audio quality during online gaming sessions. Its noise-canceling feature effectively eliminated background distractions, providing a immersive experience. The sleek and durable design adds a touch of sophistication to my gaming setup. Easy plug-and-play functionality ensured a hassle-free installation process. Overall, this microphone is a solid investment for any gamer seeking top-notch audio performance. This is very worth it for its price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Streaming
reviews.reviewText: Quick delivery, great packaging, easy to assemble, and very attractive! A one-touch mute is perfect when streaming and when needed to mute. I've been getting countless compliments from my community. Would be perfect if it was Bluetooth capable but I give it a solid 9.5/10!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's great for streaming/gaming
reviews.reviewText: I have no complaints except the boom arm is a bit stiff which is good and bad. It's sturdy but tough to move into position, you need to hold it with one hand and extend it with the other. Which you can get the tripod and don't have to mess with the boom arm. Other than that the audio is crystal clear when using headphones with it, as well on my stream and my coms when playing with friends, the gain nob is easy to adjust, and it's all plug and play very simple installation. I would highly recommend this for any gaming, streaming, or podcasting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Got this for a gift, so I tested it first to see the setup process and the functionality. The set up is intuitive and I got it done pretty quick. The mic itself works great and the light adds a nice touch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality microphone for gaming, blogging, text to speech, and so much more!
reviews.reviewText: Easy to set up and so nice to be able to place it exactly where you need it for best sound quality. The wind shield is a nice bonus.I love the indicator, lights on when it's live, light is off when muted, very nice to have that quality indicator so I know when people can hear me and when I'm not live. There's also a headphone jack so you can monitor sound if you'd like or to adjust it as necessary.Plug and play with no problem on my Mac. Very happy with my purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The microphone is nice. The boom arm isn't that great. There's a sticker on the inside of the box for a free tripod. That would work much better for me as the boom arm doesn't attach to my desk conveniently. However the website doesn't exist, so there is no tripod.

It’s a solid & qualify made microphone that looks great with colour changing options.The solid base of the microphone allows to position it to convenient position and with a crystal clear sound quality it greatly compliments my gaming experience.Also I found useful volume and mute controls on the top of the microphone.I am happy with the purchase!

Je fait de la M.A.O. et J'en suis ravi, le son est excellent/pas de souffle ou parasites. Son bouton ON/OFF tactile sur le dessus est très pratique, et son esthétique avec ses leds de couleurs qui changent de couleur plutôt stylé !Son support/bras permet pas mal de mobilité et une bonne fixation.

Das Mikrofon habe ich für meine Tochter bestellt und sie liebt es. Klarer Sound und einfache Nutzung für Anfänger. Die Farben leuchten sehr schön. Die Halterung ist leicht zu montierten und super praktisch. Einfach tolles Produkt. Gerne wieder und nur zu empfehlen.

Compré este micrófono porque me pareció una buena relación calidad precio y la verdad es q me ha sorprendido gratamente. La calidad es bastante aceptable y algunos detalles , como las gomas para evitar vibraciones, me parecen muy útiles. La calidad del sonido es bastante buena para lo que yo lo uso. No se a largo plazo cómo irá pero tengo buenas sensaciones. En resumen, contento con la compra.

reviews.reviewTitle: Microfono con luci RGB e silenziamento tattile: perfetto per le tue trasmissioni dal vivo
reviews.reviewText: Ho acquistato questo microfono per le mie trasmissioni dal vivo e devo dire che sono rimasto molto soddisfatto. Il microfono ha un design elegante e moderno, con luci RGB che cambiano colore in base al suono. Il microfono ha anche una funzione di silenziamento tattile molto comoda, che permette di disattivare l’audio e le luci con un semplice tocco. Il microfono ha una qualità del suono eccellente, grazie al modello polare cardioide che riduce i rumori di fondo e alla capsula con diaframma a condensatore che cattura una gamma ampia di frequenze. Il microfono è anche molto stabile e facile da posizionare, grazie alla base ponderata in acciaio al carbonio e al braccio metallico flessibile. Il microfono è compatibile con PC e PS4/PS5 e si collega tramite un cavo USB rimovibile1. Lo consiglio a chi cerca un microfono da gioco di alta qualità e con un’ottima estetica.Il microfono ha anche una funzionalità secondaria che ho trovato molto interessante:si tratta di tenere premuto il pulsante dello spegnimento e cambierà il colore della luce in fissa. (premere a lungo il pulsante di disattivazione audio per ridurre la luminosità della luce RGB). In questo modo, si può decidere quando si sta trasmettendo in diretta, magari mettendo il colore fisso per far capire che si è in diretta "On Air". Questa è una caratteristica molto utile e originale, che rende il microfono ancora più attraente.
